response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its high-quality features and durability, it's truly an investment that will serve you well for years to come. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I would like to extend this exclusive opportunity to you for $120. This price reflects the exceptional quality and functionality of the product while allowing you to enjoy significant savings compared to market rates. I believe this is a fair and attractive offer that aligns with both our interests. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product.", "product_price": 120}
